aaaa.name: Even bigger dice
aaaa.desc:
Gives your dice
another 2 extra sides

gamblingAddiction.name: Gambling Addiction
gamblingAddiction.desc: Doubles bots score but doubles rewards.

highStakes.name: High Stakes!
highStakes.desc: Bots get +1 difficulty, but all rewards increased by 50%.

luckyCharm.name: Lucky Charm
luckyCharm.desc: Bots get +1 difficulty, but adds +2 to your rolls.

diceMaster.name: Dice Master!
diceMaster.desc: Adds 3 extra dice sides, bots get +2 difficulty.

fortuneFavour.name: Fortune's favour.
fortuneFavour.desc: Multiplies rewards by 3 but bots get +2 difficult and their base roll is doubled.
